trans-unit.source: Specifies which parts are included in a message.
This class contains the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification> instances of different messages, each distinguished by the message Action.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"></xref> class from another instance of this class.
The other <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"></xref>.
Gets a collection of action keys.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the keys of a collection of action parts.
Adds channel message parts to the collections in the instance of this class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification"></xref> that contains the parts to be added.
parts is `null`.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification"></xref> is read-only.
Adds message parts to the `MessagePartSpecification` that corresponds to the specified action.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification"></xref> that contains the parts to be added.
The action key to match to.
parts or action is `null`.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification"></xref> is read-only.
Gets a message part specification that contains the channel parts.
The channel parts denote the message parts that are common to all the messages.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification"></xref> that contains the channel parts.
Indicates whether the specification is read-only.
You can use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification.MakeReadOnly%2A> to set this property to `true`.
`true` if the specification is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Sets the specification to read-only.
Checks whether there are parts that match a given action key.
If the given action is not present in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, then the message parts configured for the Wildcard action ("*") are returned.
The action key.
When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification"></xref> that contains the parts found.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if matching parts were found; otherwise, `false`.
Checks whether there are parts that match a given action key.
If the given action is not present in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, then the message parts configured for the Wildcard action ("*") are returned.
The action key.
When `true`, restricts the parts to the current channel.
When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification"></xref> that contains the parts found.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if matching parts were found; otherwise, `false`.
